ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] How to extract files from .warc archives ?
ygData.msgSnippet: you can extract a single file (record) knowing its offset with this: http://code.hanzoarchives.com/warc-tools/src/6e1d36297688/hanzo/warcextract.py
